data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Hulunbuir, Nei Mongol, China know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hulunbuir, Nei Mongol, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 220,217 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Hulunbuir to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 220,217 believers in the county of Hulunbuir.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Evenki people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Hulunbuir, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 220,217 believers living in the county of Hulunbuir. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Hulunbuir, Nei Mongol, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
